column6: THE SUPERSTAR CREATIVE TEAM OF SPIDER-MAN: BLUE, HULK: GRAY, AND DAREDEVIL: YELLOW BRING THEIR MAGIC TO AMERICA'S #1 HERO! Captured! With CAP and BUCKY behind enemy lines, who will save them? Definitely not the HOWLING COMMANDOS! They've been taken prisoner, too! You'll never believe who the newest Nazi soldiers are!
